category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA130_num_of_objects_to_load_per_call
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to limit the number of objects loaded from Teamcenter for each single loadObjects() SOA call. Possible values: - 0 or any negative number: no limit to the number of objects loaded with a single call to loadObjects() SOA method. - Any positive number: this will be the maximum number of objects loaded from Teamcenter per single loadObjects() SOA call. The default value is: 5000.
